scripts.setup: npm run setup-env && npm run index-files
scripts.setup-all: npm run setup && npm run setup-server && npm run setup-client
scripts.start-server: npm run setup-env && npm run index-files && cd media-server && npm start
scripts.start-client: npm run setup-env && cd media-viewer && npm start
scripts.start: npm run setup-env && concurrently "npm run start-server" "npm run start-client"
scripts.docker-build: npm run build-viewer && npm run inject-docker-env && docker-compose build
scripts.docker: npm run build-viewer && npm run inject-docker-env && docker-compose up --build
scripts.docker-full: npm run setup-all && npm run build-viewer && npm run inject-docker-env && docker-compose up --build
